alert.note: Alert for Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Prentiss County through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Booneville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Jumpertown, Wheeler, Thrashers, Blackland, Frankstown, Gaston and Altitude. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
